akas: Rapides et Millionnaires Canada (French title) (original script title)
akas from release info: Rapides et Millionnaires Canada (French title) (original script title)

1.title: Ocala
1.plot: Enter the incredible world of 3 passionate speed racing millionaires. We followed them for a year and this is what we can tell you about them: they love luxury and challenges, on and off the track.

2.title: Las Vegas
2.plot: In the last episode, O.B. lost the millionaires' bet but he honors his word and takes his friends to Las Vegas to make them live an unforgettable trip full of surprises and adrenaline.

3.title: Chicago
3.plot: This week, Gidi tries to pulverize the quarter mile world record. While Gidi throws in the work for his passion, Jatty gets his hands dirty and O.B, on his end, spoils his girlfriend.

4.title: Italy
4.plot: O.B. is in Italy with his girlfriend Maud. His mission: to be the first Canadian to own a Pagani. O.B. and Mr. Pagani may be passionate about cars.

5.title: Toronto
5.plot: O.B. is planning on selling some of his spectacular cars at one of the biggest car auctions in Canada. Meanwhile, Gidi is in Martin, Michigan where he's trying once again to break the GT-R quarter mile world record.

6.title: Vancouver
6.plot: Jatty is taking his Vancouver friends to a one-of-a-kind car rally. In the meantime, the ever-adventurous Gidi teaches the basics of driving a Lambo to his girlfriend.

7.title: Colorado Part 1
7.plot: Our three millionaires are gearing up for a push up challenge. Then they're off to Colorado for a new drag race competition. OB has every intention of making an impact on the racetrack and on his girlfriend's heart with his big proposal.

8.title: Colorado Part 2
8.plot: Gidi and O.B. fight to win the big title. Gidi will need to learn to handle his stress. On the menu: lots of adrenaline with an extra serving of party.

9.title: Portland
9.plot: We're in Portland, Oregon. Our speed addict millionaires are once again about to face off on the track. On the last episode, Gidi smashed a world record. But will he be able to hold onto it?

10.title: Cap Canaveral
10.plot: Gidi is making one final attempt to be the fastest man in the world behind the wheel of a Nissan GT-R, on a quarter mile track. While this time O.B. arrives on the Cap Canaveral landing track with his Lambo.

imdb.plot outline: Road Kings is a documentary series based on the life of three wealthy entrepreneurs whose real passion resides into car racing. The three men are followed all around the world while they attend different racing events, all this, for the ultimate goal of beating speed world records and winning races for the sake of glory. But racing is also far from being the only aspect the show focuses on. Of course, the lavish lifestyle of the three colorful protagonists is really put forward in the show: life with the girlfriends, trips around the world, big expenses and high adrenaline activities. Every day of their unique lives is subject to a show of its own.
imdb.title: Road Kings
plot: _Road Kings_ (qv) is a documentary series based on the life of three wealthy entrepreneurs whose real passion resides into car racing. The three men are followed all around the world while they attend different racing events, all this, for the ultimate goal of beating speed world records and winning races for the sake of glory. But racing is also far from being the only aspect the show focuses on. Of course, the lavish lifestyle of the three colorful protagonists is really put forward in the show: life with the girlfriends, trips around the world, big expenses and high adrenaline activities. Every day of their unique lives is subject to a show of its own.::Guillaume Gauthier
